info.name: Project Free TV - Dark and Clean
info.description:
Inspired by the FF theme NASA Night Launch and the other mods at http://home.comcast.net/~username54321/starfield/mods.html

Update 3-31-2010: Got rid of the hard to read red titles. Tweaked most of the other colors slightly to match web-safe pallet. Added color to the visited links.

Constructive feedback is always welcome!
